item.title: Writing a Song a Week: Rules of the Game
item.description: The song must be recorded in some way, but it does not need to be mixed or mastered. The song should be at least 2 minutes long. Ideas, chord progressions, melodies, beats, lyrics, etc can be used even if they were written before 2021. More than one song can be written in a week. A song doesn’t need to be written each week exactly, but there must be 52 songs written by December 31, 2021.
